remarks: Change bound variables of double restricted universal quantification, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-2004.)
statement:
cbvral2v.1 $e |- ( x = z -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvral2v.2 $e |- ( y = w -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvral2v $p |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ph <-> A. z e. A A. w e. B ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A z $.
$d B w $.
$d B x y $.
$d B y z $.
$d ch w $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps y $.
